title: Guidance
content:
Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Guidance

Guidance can be acquired by the following classes: Cleric, Druid, Warlock (Pact of the Tome), Arcane Archer Guidance can be cast by using the following Items: Silver Pendant

Cleric, Druid, Warlock (Pact of the Tome), Arcane Archer

Guidance Tips & Notes

Perhaps the best Cantrip in the game, essential for social interactions with NPCs. Don't adventure forth without it. Guidance can be applied dynamically during dice rolls
